document.full_text: tunisian police arrested a libyan man in a car packed with kalashnikov rifle cartridges on wednesday in the south of the country, 80 km (50 miles) from the border with libya.
document.title: tunisian police arrest libyan transporting munitions
lines_and_colors: tunisian police arrested a libyan man in a car packed with kalashnikov rifle cartridges on wednesday in the south of the country, 80 km (50 miles) from the border with libya.
